posts.title: Exploring Nairobi's Creative Scene
posts.author: Kamau
posts.content: From street murals to underground poetry slams, Nairobi's creative community continues to thrive. Here’s what I discovered after a weekend of exploration.

posts.title: How I Built My First Web App with Vanilla JS
posts.author: Wanjiru
posts.content: No frameworks, no shortcuts — just raw JavaScript and determination. This is a breakdown of everything I learned building my first functional app.

posts.title: The Power of Morning Rituals
posts.author: Otieno
posts.content: Waking up before sunrise changed how I approach productivity, wellness, and clarity. Here are 5 rituals that shaped my mornings for the better.

posts.title: Photography as a Form of Protest
posts.author: Achieng
posts.content: Documenting truth through the lens is more than art—it's activism. These photojournalists are risking everything to tell stories the world needs to see.
